title: Enping
text:
Enping, <a href="postal%20map%20romanization">alternately</a> <a href="romanization%20of%20Chinese">romanized</a> as Yanping, is a <a href="county-level%20city">county-level city</a> in <a href="Guangdong">Guangdong</a> province, China, administered as part of the <a href="prefecture%20%28China%29">prefecture</a>-level <a href="prefecture-level%20city">city</a> of <a href="Jiangmen">Jiangmen</a>.
Enping administers an area of and had an estimated population of 460,000 in 2005. Its <a href="Chinese%20diaspora">diaspora</a> accounts for around 420,000 <a href="overseas%20Chinese">overseas Chinese</a>. The area around Enping is known for its many <a href="hot%20springs">hot springs</a>.
Geography.
Enping is located in southwest <a href="Guangdong">Guangdong</a>, at the western edge of the <a href="Pearl%20River%20Delta">Pearl River Delta</a> and beside the <a href="South%20China%20Sea">South China Sea</a>. Enping borders <a href="Kaiping">Kaiping</a> to the northeast and <a href="Yangjing">Yangjing</a> to the southwest.
History.
EnpingCounty was established in AD220. Under the <a href="Qing%20dynasty">Qing</a>, it made up part of the <a href="Fu%20%28administrative%20subdivision%29">commandery</a> of <a href="Zhaoqing">Zhaoqing</a> and was one of the <a href="Siyi">Four Counties</a> responsible for much of the early <a href="Chinese%20diaspora">Chinese diaspora</a> from Guangdong in the 19th century. Many <a href="overseas%20Chinese">overseas Chinese</a> trace their ancestry to Enping, particularly among the <a href="Chinese%20in%20Venezuela">Chinese in Venezuela</a>. Migrants from Enping and their families make up about 200,000 of the country's estimated 400,000 Chinese. Emigration to Venezuela occurred primarily in the decades including and following the <a href="World%20Wars">World Wars</a>, with the largest batch leaving at the end of the <a href="Cultural%20Revolution">Cultural Revolution</a> in the late 1970s. Enping was made a <a href="county-level%20city">county-level city</a> in 1994. The <a href="Enping%20financial%20crisis">Enping financial crisis</a> later in the decade led to a massive scandal and the loss of financial services in the city.
Administrative divisions.
Enping comprises 10 towns, 3 sub-district offices, 4 farms and stations, and 174 village neighborhood committees.
Demographics.
Enping is a part of the <a href="Greater%20Taishan%20Region">Greater Taishan Region</a> or <a href="Sze%20Yap">Sze Yap</a> Region, which includes <a href="Kaiping">Kaiping</a>, <a href="Xinhui">Xinhui</a>, Enping and Taishan.
